page.title: 11Grizedale
page.content:
{Grizedale Tree Nursery}has a variety of different trees, including a large dawn redwood. Some of the beds have seedlings, others have cuttings in them.
Next to the nursery there are 2 chalets and 1 cottage. Up the road is the{Ormandy Hotel}and restaurant; they offer accommodation, a meal and tickets for the Theatre.
There is a{museum}at Grizedale; in it is a forestry display which includes a large model of a village and forest, and various stuffed animals in glass cases. There is an information room with bird boxes and plant boxes for sale, you can also buy venison. There is also an old saw mill but it will close down this year.
